name: unconfirmed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If facts are unconfirmed, it is not certain if they are true: According to unconfirmed reports, two people were killed in the riots last night. Opposite
confirmed

(of information) not proven to be true or false: an unconfirmed report
